Method Detail

registerPaintable

public void registerPaintable(edu.neumont.csc415.IPaintable paintable)
Registers a class for painting. The desktop calls registered Paintable classes with a graphics context so they can render themselves on the desktop.

Parameters:
paintable -

Gets the width (in pixels) of the character. For proportional spaced fonts, the character width may vary from character to character.
